js-events_key2: Aapne onClick event ke baarein mei padha hoga. Aise hi bahut saare events hote hai jaise **onchange**, **onclick**, **onmouseover**, **onmouseout**, **on`key`down**, **onload**.
js-events_key4:
Har event kisi HTML element se **bind** hota (yaani attach ya judta) hai. Jaise yeh events 
button se **bind** hue hai. Toh **on`key`down** ko check karne se pehle, button par click karo
and phir koi bhi `key` press karke dekho, usse yeh event **trigger** (yaani start/shuru) honge.
